comment: If you want to learn- Do NOT Take Him. It you need a easy grade without any efforts-Why Don't You Take? You will be given study guide with 200 questions on it. Just memorize that and only about 40 questions will be on the test. Easy and easy...

He does not teach much. Lecture is reading ppts + playing youtube in class + fluffy talking. Quizzes and exams are from test guides. You get scores without learning things. If you want a good grade, take him. If you want to learn, avoid him.
Great teacher ....

He has an accent but not to bad. He is understandable if you pay attention.4 tests, thats it for a grade. He passes out a study guide that has 150-200 questions that will be on the 50 question test. There's no way to memorize all that so you do have to understand the material but the packet really helps. Overall, would take again
Material can be difficult but all quizzes and exams come directly from study guides. Take him.
Great professor! Very intelligent and knows Econ well. Use his study guides well and you can expect a A!  Attendance was not mandatory but was very helpful.

Khan is THE GREATEST EVER... Grade is from 4 total test. Just pay attention and follow his study guides to the tee. DO NOT PASS HIM UP FOR BOTH ECON 2100 & 2200. He really does have all the time in the world for his students and he is a very bright, intelligent professor!
Great professor! Great sense of humor and attitude! He is difficult to understand at first but once you get used to him, he's fine. Study guide really helps with tests for an easy A.
Great teacher, Study his study guides, The grade completely consist of 4 test and attendance. Khan Is very nice and has all the time in the world for students. TAKE HIM EVERY CHANCE YOU GET
Best teacher I have had at Kennesaw. He really cares, and will go the extra mile to help you. Take this class!
Great guy.  Tests are easy if you just study the study guide he gives before the test.  You don't need the book.  Class attendance is mandatory.

Don't buy the book unless you really want it. Just study the study guides and if you need more info look at the power points he provides. Go to class cause he counts it in the final grade. Be prepared for a thick accent though. Could only understand half of what he had to say.
All i have to tell u is that you shud take this class. Easy A

This is the best class you can ever take to get an easy A. Just make sure u do the study guides and ur gona pass. 4 tests i bombed the first one and got all A on the rest. I RECCOMEND U TAKE THIS GUY. If u failed this class then ur a retard. Cos even retards can pass this class
Sweet heart. Uses direct questions from study guide for all exams. Takes attendance every class, and adds points to your final grade.

Dr. Khan is the best. If you struggle with ECON and NEED to pass take him. Gives you study to all his test. Funny guy also. If you go to class and study the study guides there is NO reason for you not to get an A.
Great Professor....does take attendance which goes towards 10 percent of your grade. Has a good sense of humor.  If you study the study guides give no reason why you wouldn't get an A.

Got an A on all the tests and I played games during class and never bought the book. All you have to do is study the test banks an you will pass. Just for emphasis, do NOT buy the book. It is a waste of money.

Bless his heart, he's the sweetest man. He really tries to help students understand and become involved in the class. He gives 200 question study guides for each 50 question exam (3 exams) and the questions come straight from the study guides. You will make an A as long as you study the guides. Attendence counts as part of your grade! Take him!

I really liked Professor Khan. He's pretty hilarious, and says some of the funniest things. His accent is pretty strong but you get used to it. He gives you the study guide and all you have to do is look over it. Gives extensions if you ask. Loved him!
Easy easy easy. he gives you test questions in class and picks from the bank he gives you. He's also pretty funny!
It was an easy A. he gives you a test bank and the the question are exactly the same as the test bank. He is a good teacher. Very easy class.
You'd have to be brain dead to fail his class.
Professor Khan is a great professor. I learned a lot in his class and really appreciated his teaching style. If you study the study guide and come to class you will do well.
Worst professor I have ever had at KSU. I went to class every single day and got a D. He did not care about students grades at all. I would not recommend taking this teacher.
If you want an easy A but do not want to learn ANYTHING, this class is for you.  Just memorize the test bank and you will get a 100 on each test.

Attendance is not mandatory but does take roll and worth 10% of grade. Three tests drops lowest, plus final. Posts study tests online as well as his powerpoints. Nice guy, tries his best to explain any problems.
Professor Khan is very much what the ratings say. I am in his class now as of fall 2009 and it is very easy. The class lecture is quick and clear.

Great professor!  He had a tendency to over explain some things but is very thorough. I had to sit in class for 6 hours on Saturdays but it flew by because he has a great sense of humor and kept the class interesting.  He's not bad on the eyes either...
Great Econ professor.  Very funny!  Had for Saturday class and looked forward to going.

Do not drop the class because he is foreign. He is really funny and class is always entertaining. Don't buy the book. He puts test banks online before a test and your test questions come out of them. Very Good Professor!
very nice. fun class. Easy A. gives review before test.
